paragraphs.text:
%md
Check Engine Light
===================

This notebook is meant to be run by the BDE Admins in order to identify when issues are affecting Zeppelin's functionality. These situations may include:

    * Upgrading HDP or Ambari versions
    * Reconfiguration of Zeppelin or some dependent technology
    * Restarts of any sort
    
Just click --- Run all paragraphs --- at the top, and you should see True as the only output for each paragraph below, other than this one.

msg.data:
Check Engine Light

This notebook is meant to be run by the BDE Admins in order to identify when issues are affecting Zeppelin's functionality. These situations may include:

* Upgrading HDP or Ambari versions
* Reconfiguration of Zeppelin or some dependent technology
* Restarts of any sort

Just click — Run all paragraphs — at the top, and you should see True as the only output for each paragraph below, other than this one.

paragraphs.text:
%sh
hdfs dfs -get /projects/common/spark-solr-3.0.2-shaded.jar /tmp/spark-solr.jar
if [ ! -f /tmp/spark-solr.jar ]; then echo "False"; else echo "True"; fi
rm /tmp/spark-solr.jar

%dep
z.load("/tmp/spark-solr.jar")

%pyspark
arr=sc.parallelize([1, 2, 3, 4, 5])
result = arr.map(lambda x: x * x)
local = result.collect()
equal = map(lambda x: x[0] == x[1], zip(local, [1, 4, 9, 16, 25]))
isEqual = True
for val in equal:
    isEqual = isEqual & val
print(isEqual)

%sql
SELECT * FROM bde_stats.wrkflw_evnt_lg ORDER BY evnt_strt_ts DESC LIMIT 10

paragraphs.text:
%r
localDF <- data.frame(name=c("John", "Smith", "Sarah"), age=c(19, 23, 18))
df <- createDataFrame(sqlContext, localDF)
registerTempTable(df, "people")
teenagers <- sql(sqlContext, "SELECT name FROM people WHERE age >= 13 AND age < 20")
teenagersLocalDF <- collect(teenagers)
print(nrow(teenagersLocalDF) == 2)

paragraphs.text:
%spark2.pyspark
arr = spark.range(1, 5)
result = arr.withColumn("id", arr.id * arr.id)
local = map(lambda x: x['id'], result.select("id").rdd.collect())
equal = map(lambda x: x[0] == x[1], zip(local, [1, 4, 9, 16, 25]))
isEqual = True
for val in equal:
    isEqual = isEqual & val
print(isEqual)

%spark2.sql
SELECT * FROM bde_stats.wrkflw_evnt_lg ORDER BY evnt_strt_ts DESC LIMIT 10

%spark2.r
localDF <- data.frame(name=c("John", "Smith", "Sarah"), age=c(19, 23, 18))
df <- createDataFrame(sqlContext, localDF)
registerTempTable(df, "people")
teenagers <- sql(sqlContext, "SELECT name FROM people WHERE age >= 13 AND age < 20")
teenagersLocalDF <- collect(teenagers)
print(nrow(teenagersLocalDF) == 2)

%livy
val arr = sc.parallelize(List(1, 2, 3, 4, 5))
val result = arr.map(x => x * x)
val local = result.collect()
print(local.zip(Array(1, 4, 9, 16, 25)).map{ case (x, y) => x == y}.reduceLeft(_ && _))

%livy.pyspark
arr=sc.parallelize([1, 2, 3, 4, 5])
result = arr.map(lambda x: x * x)
local = result.collect()
equal = map(lambda x: x[0] == x[1], zip(local, [1, 4, 9, 16, 25]))
isEqual = True
for val in equal:
    isEqual = isEqual & val
print(isEqual)

result = arr.map(lambda x: x * x)
local = result.collect()
equal = map(lambda x: x[0] == x[1], zip(local, [1, 4, 9, 16, 25]))
isEqual = True

    isEqual = isEqual & val
print(isEqual)

%livy.sparkr
localDF <- data.frame(name=c("John", "Smith", "Sarah"), age=c(19, 23, 18))
df <- createDataFrame(sqlContext, localDF)
registerTempTable(df, "people")
teenagers <- sql(sqlContext, "SELECT name FROM people WHERE age >= 13 AND age < 20")
teenagersLocalDF <- collect(teenagers)
print(nrow(teenagersLocalDF) == 2)

%jdbc(hive)
SELECT * FROM bde_stats.wrkflw_evnt_lg ORDER BY evnt_strt_ts DESC LIMIT 10
